content.rendered:
Our Garden Roses & Loco Love offers a romantic blend of fine taste and local support. Perfumed Garden Roses, lovingly grown by our dedicated micro grower, that grace the Northern NSW region. Paired with artisanal Loco Love chocolates, handmade in the beautiful Byron Bay. We add no additional foliage.

Finished with our signature wrap and trailing ribbon.

The beauty of nature lies in its diversity, and we embrace this, with no two garden Rose flowers the same! Images are provided for illustrative purposes only. Flower dimensions and colour vary depending on seasons and availability. Please place your trust in us, to choose the finest flowers to convey your sentiments.

Size guide ~ Plinth diameter 32cm
Standard option pictured

GST Included. Delivery calculated at checkout.
